mapper.insert: insert into customer (customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_email, customer_contact, customer_birth, customer_gender, customer_level, customer_point) values ( #{customerId}, #{customerPw}, #{customerName}, #{customerEmail}, #{customerContact}, #{customerBirth}, #{customerGender}, #{customerLevel}, #{customerPoint} )
